mapper.select: select cal.cdate from cal where mtnum=#{value} group by cdate having count(*) >= (select count(*) from cal where mtnum=#{value} group by cdate order by count(*) desc limit 1);
select cal.mtnum as m, cal.mnum, cal.cdate as c, cal.ctime, (select count(*) from cal where cal.mtnum=m and cal.cdate=c) as total from cal where cal.mtnum=#{value};
mapper.insert: insert into cal (mnum, mtnum, cdate, ctime) values (#{memberNo}, #{meetingNo}, #{calendarDate}, #{calendarTime});
mapper.select: select count(*) from (select count(*) from (select cdate from cal left outer join meet on cal.mtnum=meet.mtnum where meet.mtnum=#{value}) as tt group by cdate having count(*) >= (select count(*) from (select cdate from cal left outer join meet on cal.mtnum=meet.mtnum where meet.mtnum=#{value}) as tt group by cdate order by count(*) desc limit 1)) as ff;
